channel.title: Zdr source(262+ downloads)
channel.description:
I give all credits to Ben! R.I.P zdr :) I got this client from someone off you tube i used it and it works fine I'm not 100% sure if virus or not. If you downloaded please post
Source = http://uppit.com/HV8783 Client = http://rs310.rapidshare.com/files/85315862/Reloaded_Client_Version_Five.zip

item.title: Zdr source(262+ downloads)
item.dc:creator: @yourusername yourusername
item.description:
@yourusername wrote:

[quote=“Taz Ownz Ya, post:31, topic:269312”][quote author=ipodfreakz link=topic=355411.msg2722925#msg2722925 date=1238109657]
You have to ask the owner i guess. and take a snap of the pic he says yes and post on here before it gets locked.
[/quote]

Ew, take this away.

Stop spamming:

Please stop posting after my post. If you ever see an advertisement, simply refrain from saying ‘wrong section’ repeatedly, and just report the member.
Reported

No advertising, link or ip.
A.K.A Spamming

Hey tico, you might want to add something about outrageously long topic titles (the ones that jack up the spacing). I mean really, I can’t be the only one here who thinks //////@@@@@@@@@@@DIPSHITSCAPE@@@@@@@@@@@//////\ looks like shit… And I don’t think we need the whole “200+ downloads!” or “is finally out!”. All we really need is the topic name, and if its a source or client.

I would find it rather redundant, and it should be well known seeing as I would classify that as spam, and the user would receive a warning/mute.

Remove or - /Reported[/quote]
i dont need you to tell me what to do ill try the client ill see the ip i dont advertise…This isnt my client its off youtube ok! You gotta change ip urself

Read full topic

item.title: Zdr source(262+ downloads)
item.dc:creator: @bhpkyeah satesql
item.description:
@bhpkyeah wrote:

[quote=“primadude, post:29, topic:269312”][quote author=satesql link=topic=355411.msg2726296#msg2726296 date=1238365449]

Ew, take this away.

Haha, its a good source tbh… Its old though… all i really know is owner died in a car crash and not every1 had source but i found after 1 hour of looking so i put up

WTF Ben DIED?!?! Last time I heard he was just playing golf?

i heard he died, i’m not 100% source so… :S

Info i got

I heard the server died, Because (Ben) i think the owner, Died from a car accident…Poor news to the fans. This was 1 of the best Servers TO come. RIP BEN RIP ZDIDDY
ben didnt die T X hacked the server from bens dedi and released it so ben said i quit.
not 100% sure

This seems all very confusing, if the death thing is true then R.I.P, on the other hand this source looks ugly…

It was one of the best at the time, if not, The best. I remember I based my second server off of this.

If I remember correctly this is just another leached server from the original p server creaters… And there long gone…
[/quote]

It wasn’t leeched. It was very different from every server that was around at the time. All the other servers were based off czar. This was before the (shit) era of Deltascape.[/quote]

I agree with the emudelta era… pretty lame…

Read full topic
